Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: Oversight - Community Composting in NYC
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Sanitation and the Department of Parks and Recreation to continue to engage and collaborate with local communities to encourage and allow community composting to be carried out on parkland that is safe for residents.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYC Dept of Sanitation and the Dep of Parks and Recreation to continue to engage and collaborate with local communities to encourage and allow community composting to be carried out on parkland that is safe for residents.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Reynoso, Deutsch, Cabrera, Constantinides, Powers and Levin

Items.Title: Oversight - Community Composting in NYC
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York City Department of Sanitation and the Department of Parks and Recreation to continue to engage and collaborate with local communities to encourage and allow community composting to be carried out on parkland that is safe for residents.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: NYC Dept of Sanitation and the Dep of Parks and Recreation to continue to engage and collaborate with local communities to encourage and allow community composting to be carried out on parkland that is safe for residents.
